org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitTask

Packages that use BukkitTask
Package
Description
com.destroystokyo.paper.exception
 
org.bukkit.scheduler
Classes dedicated to letting plugins run code at specific time intervals, including thread safety.

    @NotNull BukkitTask
    BukkitScheduler.runTaskAsynchronously(@NotNull Plugin plugin, @NotNull Runnable task)
    Asynchronous tasks should never access any API in Bukkit. Great care should be taken to assure the thread-safety of asynchronous tasks.
